BackLVCloseGripPulldownPL.name: Lever Close Grip Pulldown (plate-loaded)
BackLVCloseGripPulldownPL.preparation: Grasp handles and sit with thighs under padded supports.
BackLVCloseGripPulldownPL.execution: Pull down handles to sides of chest while leaning back slightly. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackLVCloseGripPulldownPL.comments: Erector Spinae can become slightly engaged when torso arches back.
BackLVCloseGripPulldownPL.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, brachialis, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackLVFrontPulldownPL.name: Lever Front Pulldown (plate loaded)
BackLVFrontPulldownPL.preparation: Grasp lever bar with wide grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
BackLVFrontPulldownPL.execution: Pull down lever bar to upper chest. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackLVFrontPulldownPL.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide.
BackLVFrontPulldownPL.synergists: infraspinatus, rhomboids, levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, bicepsbrachii, deltoidposterior, brachialis, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, teresminor

BackLVPulldownH.name: Lever Pulldown (plate loaded)
BackLVPulldownH.preparation: Grasp handles to each side with overhand grip. Sit on seat and position thighs under leg pads.
BackLVPulldownH.execution: Pull levers down to sides of shoulders. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackLVPulldownH.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackLVPulloverH.name: Lever Pullover (plate loaded)
BackLVPulloverH.preparation: Adjust seat height so lever is near shoulder axis. Sit on machine. Place elbows on pads and grasp bar from behind.
BackLVPulloverH.execution: Pull lever forward and down until elbows are to sides. Return until shoulders are fully flexed, or upper arms are parallel to torso. Repeat.
BackLVPulloverH.comments: Actual range of motion is dependent upon individual shoulder flexibility.
BackLVPulloverH.synergists: pectoralisminor, deltoidposterior, teresmajor, tricepsbrachii, levatorscapulae, pectoralissternal, rhomboids

BackLVRearPulldownPL.name: Lever Rear Pulldown (plate loaded)
BackLVRearPulldownPL.preparation: Grasp lever bar with wide grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
BackLVRearPulldownPL.execution: Pull lever bar down behind neck. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackLVRearPulldownPL.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide.
BackLVRearPulldownPL.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackLVUnderhandPulldownH.name: Lever Underhand Pulldown (plate loaded)
BackLVUnderhandPulldownH.preparation: Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
BackLVUnderhandPulldownH.execution: Pull down lever handles toward sides until elbows are to sides. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackLVUnderhandPulldownH.comments: See pad kick down on Hammer Machine. Also see movement on alternative machine.
BackLVUnderhandPulldownH.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, brachialis, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackLVUnderhandPulldownPL.name: Lever Underhand Pulldown (plate loaded)
BackLVUnderhandPulldownPL.preparation: Grasp lever bar with underhand grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
BackLVUnderhandPulldownPL.execution: Pull down lever handles toward sides until elbows are to sides. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackLVUnderhandPulldownPL.comments: Also see movement on Hammer Machine.
BackLVUnderhandPulldownPL.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, brachialis, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids
